tvestergaard.webhelpers.parameters

Class TextParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tvestergaard.webhelpers.parameters.AbstractParameter
      • tvestergaard.webhelpers.parameters.TextParameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parameter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateParameter, EmailParameter, FloatParameter, RangeParameter, TimeParameter, UrlParameter

    public class TextParameter
extends AbstractParameter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TextParameter.IsContainedFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isContained(CharSequence) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.IsEmptyFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isEmpty() method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.IsFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the is(CharSequence) method check fails.

      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isIn(List) method check fails.

      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isLength(int) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.IsLongerThanFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isLongerThan(int) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.IsMatchFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isMatch(Pattern) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.IsShorterThanFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isShorterThan(int) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotContainedFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notContained(CharSequence) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotEmptyFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notEmpty() method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the not(CharSequence) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotInFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notIn(List) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotLengthFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notLength(int) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotLongerThanFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notLongerThan(int) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotMatchFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the notMatch(Pattern) method check fails.
      static interface  TextParameter.NotShorterThanFailureCallback
      The functional interface defining the routine notified when the isLongerThan(int) method check fails.

      • TextParameter

        public TextParameter(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value,
                     java.util.List<TextParameterFailureHandler> failureHandler)
        Creates a new TextParameter.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the TextParameter.
        value - The value of the TextParameter.
        failureHandler - The TextParameterFailureHandler instances used as callbacks for when checks fails.

        value - The value of the TextParameter.

    • Method Detail

      • is

        public boolean is(java.lang.CharSequence other,
                  TextParameter.IsFailureCallback... failureCallbacks)
        Checks that the internal value of the TextParameter equals the provided CharSequence.

        The TextParameter.IsFailureCallback.isFailure(TextParameter, CharSequence) method on all the provided TextParameter.IsFailureCallback instances will be called if the check fails. The TextParameterFailureHandler.isFailure(TextParameter, CharSequence) methods on the instances of TextParameterFailureHandler provided to this object will not be called.

        Parameters:
        other - The CharSequence to compare the internal value of the TextParameter to.
        failureCallbacks - The TextParameter.IsFailureCallbacks called in case the check fails.
        Returns:
        true if the value equals the provided {code CharSequence}, false in all other cases.

      • is

        public boolean is(java.lang.CharSequence other)
        Checks that the internal value of the TextParameter equals the provided CharSequence.

        The TextParameterFailureHandler.isFailure(TextParameter, CharSequence) methods on the instances of TextParameterFailureHandler registered with this object will be called if the check fails.

        Parameters:
        other - The CharSequence to compare the internal value of the TextParameter to.
        Returns:
        true if the value equals the provided CharSequence, false in all other cases.

        Parameters:
        other - The CharSequence to compare the internal value of the TextParameter to.
        failureCallbacks - The TextParameter.NotFailureCallbacks called in case the check fails.
        Returns:
        true if the value does not equal the provided {code CharSequence}, false in all other cases.
